meanings.definition: A period of time during which a person waits or rests before being able to use a certain ability or item again in a video game.
meanings.sent1: After using a powerful attack, there is a cooldowns before you can use it again.
meanings.sent2: In the game, players have to wait for cooldowns to pass before casting spells.
meanings.sent3: During the cooldowns, the character takes a break and catches their breath.
meanings.sent4: The cooldowns felt like an eternity as the player anxiously waited to use their special move again.
meanings.sent5: The cooldowns added an element of strategy to the game, forcing players to plan their moves carefully.

meanings.definition: The act of allowing something to cool down or decrease in temperature after being heated.
meanings.sent1: The chef waited for the cooldowns of the cake before frosting it.
meanings.sent2: After baking, the cookies needed some cooldowns before they could be eaten.
meanings.sent3: The cooldowns of the hot soup were necessary to avoid burning the tongue.
meanings.sent4: The cooldowns of the metal were crucial to prevent it from warping.
meanings.sent5: The cooldowns of the freshly brewed tea made it perfect for sipping slowly.
